translation.en: -OK. [sighs] -Mom!
translation.fr: - Maman !- Tu n'as pas le droit

translation.en: What did I tell you about watching this stuff?
translation.fr: - de regarder.- C'est une soirée pyjama.

translation.en: It's a sleepover. What are we supposed to do?
translation.fr: - de regarder.- C'est une soirée pyjama. On est censées faire quoi ?

translation.en: Have a pillow fight?
OK, I'm gonna go get ready upstairs.
Pizza is on its way.
Be good.
Oh, have fun, ladies.
OK, Mia, I'm gonna be out of your hair in a minute.
translation.fr: Mia, je pars dans une minute.

translation.en: Don't worry. I've got it all under control.
translation.fr: Ne t'inquiète pas.Je maîtrise la situation.

translation.en: ♪ Angels ♪
♪ The sky-- ♪
Can you keep it down? I'm trying to work.
translation.fr: Vous pouvez baisser d'un ton ?J'essaie de travailler.

translation.en: You're writing a love song. I'm expressing my pain,
translation.fr: - Tu écris une chanson d'amour.- J'exprime ma douleur,

translation.en: not that I'd expect a 12-year-old girl to know anything about that.
translation.fr: mais les filles de 12 ans ne peuventpas comprendre.

translation.en: That's probably the pizza.
Just... keep it down, huh?
[girl 1] Speaking of songs, have any of you heard of the one
translation.fr: En parlant de chansons,vous connaissez celle

translation.en: that kills you after you sing it?
translation.fr: qui vous tue après l'avoir chantée ?

translation.en: -Oh, come on. -[girl 1] I saw it online.
translation.fr: - N'importe quoi.- J'ai vu ça en ligne.

translation.en: Then it has to be real.
No, she's right.
Apparently these boys down in Milford tried it.
translation.fr: Des gars de Milford ont essayé.

translation.en: Two of them died,
like full-on tongues hanging out,
bones shattered, dead.
They make that stuff up so kids don't believe
translation.fr: C'est pour que les jeunes ne croient pastout ce qu'ils voient en ligne.

translation.en: -everything they see online. -Prove it.
translation.fr: C'est pour que les jeunes ne croient pastout ce qu'ils voient en ligne. Prouve-le.

translation.en: -No way. -What's wrong, Olive?
If it's not real, there's nothing to be afraid of, right?
translation.fr: Si ce n'est pas réel, il n'y a rien à craindre.

translation.en: You're serious.
What better way to prove it?
translation.fr: Quelle meilleure façon de le prouver ?

translation.en: [girl] Ready?
[singing hesitantly] ♪ There was a crooked man ♪ ♪ He walked a crooked mile ♪
translation.fr: Il était une foisUn homme tordu qui marchait de travers

translation.en: ♪ He found a crooked sixpence ♪
translation.fr: Il a trouvé une pièce tordue

translation.en: ♪ Upon a crooked stile ♪
-You're serious. -Keep going.
♪ ...Crooked cat ♪
♪ Which caught a crooked mouse ♪
♪ And they all lived together ♪
♪ In a little crooked house ♪
-It's not funny! -You should've seen your faces.
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas drôle ! Vous auriez dû voir vos têtes.Ça valait le coup !

translation.en: It was totally worth it! [laughs]
translation.fr: Vous auriez dû voir vos têtes.Ça valait le coup !

translation.en: Great.
-[girl] We didn't do anything! -[girl 1] It was not our fault!
translation.fr: - On n'a rien fait !- C'était pas notre faute !

translation.en: [sighs] I'm late already. Are you guys gonna be OK?
translation.fr: Je suis en retard. Ça va aller ?

translation.en: Don't worry. We'll take care of it.
Are you sure?
I can check out the circuit breaker.
[sighs] Oh, great. Thank you.
All right, I will see you guys in the morning.
Please be good for Mia. I love you, kiddo.
translation.fr: Soyez gentilles avec Mia.Je t'aime, ma puce.

translation.en: -Thank you. -You're welcome.
-Bye. -[man] Let me go check out the breakers.
translation.fr: - De rien.- Au revoir. Je vais voir les disjoncteurs.

translation.en: I told you it was just the breakers!
Alice.
What are you doing up?
I thought I heard something.
Something's up there.
translation.fr: Il y a quelque chose là-haut.

translation.en: There's no one else here.
Told you.
Come on.
-Give me the light. -No.
-Give me the light! -No!
-Give me the light! -No!
-Mia, wake up. -What is it?
translation.fr: - Mia, réveille-toi.- Qu'est-ce qu'il y a ?

translation.en: Come on.
Stay back.
Crooked Man was here.
[Olivia] She could have come.
Things with your mom and me hadn't been that great even before everything happened.
translation.fr: Les choses n'allaient pas très bienavant que tout ça arrive.

translation.en: I'm sure she'd love to see you when you get settled.
translation.fr: Elle sera ravie de te voirquand tu seras installée.

translation.en: Do you ever see the other girls?
translation.fr: Tu vois parfois les autres filles ?

translation.en: No one really sees Alice all that much.
translation.fr: On ne voit pas beaucoup Alice.

translation.en: I heard that... Charlotte was waitressing at the diner,
and the other one...
-Violet. -Yeah. She was working at a store in town.
translation.fr: Violet. Oui. Elle travailledans un magasin en ville.

translation.en: She sure had the judge convinced.
Crazy little Olive.
The girl who killed her friend.
translation.fr: La fille qui a tué son amie.

translation.en: Six years is a long time, Livy.
People move on. They forget.
translation.fr: Les gens passent à autre chose.

translation.en: Mom didn't.
Welcome home, Olivia.
[woman] Crazy Olivia's back from the loony bin.
translation.fr: Olivia la folle est revenue de l'asile.

translation.en: It's a small town. People talk.
translation.fr: C'est une petite ville. Les gens parlent.

translation.en: Livy!
You scared me.
Is everything OK, Livy?
It's fine.
Getting settled, huh?
You um... You gonna be OK?
I'm just tired.
Leave it on!
Please?
Good night.
Leave it open.
Just a crack.
Sure, whatever you want.
Hey, I thought we'd go to the market, if you felt up to it.
translation.fr: On pourrait aller au marché, si tu veux.

translation.en: I don't even know what you like anymore.
translation.fr: Je ne sais plus ce que tu aimes.

translation.en: Mom used to make my eggs soft scrambled.
translation.fr: Maman me faisait des œufs brouillés.

translation.en: Well, I'll try.
I am trying.
Thank you.
After breakfast, do you think you can take me somewhere?
translation.fr: Après le petit-déjeuner,tu pourrais m'emmener quelque part ?

translation.en: Sure. Anywhere in particular?
I'd love something to read that's not for 12-year-olds.
translation.fr: J'aimerais lire un truc qui ne soit paspour enfant de 12 ans.

translation.en: It's like they've never seen a pretty girl before.
translation.fr: On dirait qu'ils n'ont jamaisvu de jolie fille.

translation.en: You're Olivia Shaw.
Becky Harris' brother.
Wow. You're a... a cop?
What can I say? Family business.
How is Becky anyway?
She's down at Brown. She's a freshman.
translation.fr: Elle est à Brown. En première année.

translation.en: So what's it like being back home?
translation.fr: Ça fait quoi d'être de retour ?

translation.en: [sighs] It's a little weird.
And then there's that.
translation.fr: Et puis, il y a ça.

translation.en: Hey, would you like a selfie or maybe an autograph?
translation.fr: Tu veux un selfie ou un autographe ?

translation.en: [girl] Murderer.
Thanks.
[exhales] Don't mention it.
You meet a new friend?
Dad, this is Noah. I went to school with his sister.
translation.fr: Papa, voici Noah. J'étais à l'école avec sa sœur.

translation.en: -It's nice to meet you, sir. -Likewise.
Well, listen, I really have to be going.
but if you need anything or any help with the local paparazzi,
translation.fr: Mais si tu as besoin d'aideavec les paparazzi,

translation.en: I'm here.
I will.
It's good to meet you. Bye, Mr. Shaw.
See? I told you everything was gonna be fine.
translation.fr: Je t'avais dit que tout irait bien.

translation.en: [Olivia whispers] Dad, is that you?
[Mr. Shaw] What's going on?
[Mr. Shaw] Honey, it's OK, it's OK.
It's all right.
-[woman] Good night, Steven. -[Steven] Good night.
Marilyn?
Someone there?
Too much caffeine.
[Mr. Shaw] Well, shouldn't somebody come out here check it out?
An act of mischief?
It was a threat against my daughter!
translation.fr: C'était une menace contre ma fille !

translation.en: Well, you know what? Forget it!
What'd they say?
They don't have the time or the resources to dedicate to something like this.
translation.fr: Ils n'ont ni le temps ni les ressources de se consacrer à ça.

translation.en: [sighs] It's OK, Dad.
You know what? I'm gonna go to the garage.
I might have a piece of wood big enough to cover that glass.
translation.fr: J'ai un morceau de boispour couvrir le verre.

translation.en: Promise me you'll just try to calm down.
When you have a daughter, you'll understand.
translation.fr: Quand tu auras une fille, tu comprendras.

translation.en: [woman on TV] Steven, who was 28, is described by his colleagues
translation.fr: Steven, qui avait 28 ans, est décrit

translation.en: as a hardworking and thoughtful young attorney.
translation.fr: par ses collègues comme un avocattravailleur et réfléchi.

translation.en: A lifelong resident of Eastborough,
many remember Steven as a bright and ambitious student
translation.fr: beaucoup se souviennent de Stevencomme d'un étudiant brillant

translation.en: who delivered pizzas while putting himself through law school.
translation.fr: qui livrait des pizzas pour payer ses études.

translation.en: [man] There is no easy way to describe the loss of someone like Steven,
translation.fr: Il n'est pas facile de décrirela perte d'un homme comme Steven,

translation.en: someone with such hope and promise for the future.
translation.fr: qui était plein d'espoir etde promesses pour l'avenir.

translation.en: A light that shined so brightly, but could be snuffed out so easily.
translation.fr: Une lumière qui brillait si fort, mais qui s'est si vite éteinte.

translation.en: Whatever problems Steven had in this world,
translation.fr: Quels que soient les problèmesde Steven dans ce monde,

translation.en: whatever demons he may have been facing,
translation.fr: quels que soient les démonsqu'il a dû affronter,

translation.en: we can find comfort and solace
in the fact that his soul is now in a better place,
translation.fr: dans le fait que son âme estdans un endroit meilleur,

translation.en: a place where love and peace are eternal,
translation.fr: où l'amour et la paix sont éternels,

translation.en: where there is no pain and suffering.
translation.fr: où il n'y a ni douleur ni souffrance.

translation.en: And we know that one day we shall be reunited with him,
translation.fr: Et nous savons qu'un jour,nous serons réunis avec lui

translation.en: in this glorious heaven.
"I lift up my eyes to the hills.
translation.fr: "Je lève les yeux vers les collines.

translation.en: Where does my help come from?
My help comes from the Lord,
the maker of heaven and Earth."
translation.fr: créateur des cieux et de la terre."

translation.en: In accordance with his wishes,
we now return Steven to the Earth,
translation.fr: nous renvoyons Steven à la terre

translation.en: which he enjoyed so much.
This must feel familiar for you.
translation.fr: Ça doit te rappeler quelque chose.

translation.en: You're gonna start that now?
It would've been her birthday today, you know that?
No.
Well, she's in a graveyard nearby if you wanna pay your respects.
translation.fr: Elle est dans un cimetière pas loin,si tu veux la voir.

translation.en: I'm sure she'd love to hear from you.
translation.fr: Elle sera ravie d'avoir de tes nouvelles.

translation.en: I didn't do anything to her, and you know it.
translation.fr: Je n'ai rien fait et tu le sais.

translation.en: Funny, because there was only one person holding the knife that killed her,
translation.fr: C'est drôle, une seule personne tenait le couteau qui l'a tuée,

translation.en: and it wasn't the boogeyman.
[Noah] Hey, hey, hey, forget it. They're not worth the aggravation.
translation.fr: Laisse tomber. Elles n'en valent pas la peine.

translation.en: You don't know what it's like.
Maybe not, but my bitch meter is pretty reliable.
translation.fr: Peut-être,mais mon détecteur de garce est fiable.

translation.en: Anything I can do?
[sighs] Is swatting Violet an option?
Maybe an anonymous noise complaint?
translation.fr: Une plainte anonyme pour tapage nocturne ?

translation.en: Actually, I could use a favor.
Can you give me photos of Steven's body?
translation.fr: Tu pourrais me donnerdes photos du corps de Steven ?

translation.en: Why?
Call it a hunch.
We already know what happened.
translation.fr: On sait ce qui s'est passé.

translation.en: You know what the witness said.
translation.fr: Tu sais ce qu'a dit le témoin.

translation.en: My dad would have my badge.
[Olivia] It's important.
I won't say anything to anybody. I swear.
translation.fr: Je ne dirai rien à personne. Je le jure.

translation.en: Hello, Jill.
Let her go! Let her go!
Mrs. Hutchinson.
The next-door neighbor called and said she thought
translation.fr: La voisine m'a appelée et m'a dit

translation.en: someone was trying to break into my house.
translation.fr: que quelqu'un essayait d'entrer chez moi.

translation.en: I'm so... I'm sorry. I didn't...
I thought the place was empty.
Haven't you done enough already?
translation.fr: Tu n'en as pas assez fait ?

translation.en: I know what you're thinking,
translation.fr: Je sais ce que vous pensez.

translation.en: and you have to believe me.
I didn't hurt Jill.
translation.fr: Je n'ai rien fait à Jill.

translation.en: I heard all about the evil ghost man or whatever you said it was.
translation.fr: J'ai entendu parlerde l'homme-fantôme ou je ne sais quoi.

translation.en: I'm here to find the answers.
translation.fr: Je suis là pour trouver des réponses.

translation.en: You may have convinced everybody else that you're crazy,
translation.fr: Tu as peut-être convaincu le mondeque tu es folle,

translation.en: but I know exactly what you are.
translation.fr: mais je sais exactement ce que tu es.

translation.en: Hear that?
That is the sound of karma.
I'd leave before they get here, if I were you.
Did you just see that?
[exhales] Thank you, Noah.
That's not possible.
-This is Noah. -[Olivia] Jill. Six years ago.
translation.fr: Ici Noah. Jill. Il y a six ans.

translation.en: The face, contorted body, it's the same.
translation.fr: Le visage, le corps tordu. C'est pareil.

translation.en: [exhales] What if he came back?
Who?
[Olivia] The Crooked Man.
Olive, are you--
The lyrics said,
"Down your crooked paths, he follows."
-[woman] Here you go. -[Olivia] "Paths." Plural.
What if he's coming after everyone who was in the house?
translation.fr: Et s'il s'en prenaità tous ceux qui étaient dans la maison ?

translation.en: [Noah] Look, you wanted to see photos, I sent you photos.
translation.fr: Tu voulais voir des photos, je les ai envoyées.

translation.en: You want my advice? Drop it.
translation.fr: Tu veux un conseil ? Laisse tomber.

translation.en: One more favor. Can you look up the file on Jill?
translation.fr: Une dernière faveur. - Tu peux regarder le dossier de Jill ?- Olive.

translation.en: -Olive... -I just want to see
translation.fr: - Tu peux regarder le dossier de Jill ?- Olive. Je veux voir si elle a eu des fractures.

translation.en: if she had any broken bones too.
translation.fr: Je veux voir si elle a eu des fractures.

translation.en: I told you, Steven fell out a window. Just check.
translation.fr: - Steven est tombé d'une fenêtre.- Vérifie.

translation.en: All right, I'll think about it, but I gotta run, OK?
translation.fr: - Je vais y réfléchir, je dois filer.- D'accord.

translation.en: Mrs. Larson?
[Mrs. Hutchinson] Help me!
Why are you digging up that old case?
I ran into Olivia Shaw at the Sanderson funeral yesterday.
translation.fr: J'ai croisé Olivia Shawà l'enterrement de Sanderson, hier.

translation.en: She tell you how they found her standing over Jill's body?
translation.fr: Tu sais qu'elle a été retrouvéesur le corps de Jill ?

translation.en: Covered in blood, holding the knife that matched the stab wounds?
translation.fr: Couverte de sang, avec un couteaucorrespondant aux blessures ?

translation.en: It says here the victim had multiple broken bones.
You don't think that was relevant to bring up in court?
translation.fr: Tu ne penses pas que c'était pertinent ?

translation.en: Olivia pushed her down the stairs.
translation.fr: Olivia l'a poussée dans les escaliers.

translation.en: Yeah. What about the intruder Olivia said she saw?
translation.fr: Et l'intrus qu'Olivia dit avoir vu ?

translation.en: We searched the property.
We questioned all the neighbors on the block. No one saw anyone.
translation.fr: On a interrogé les voisins.Personne n'a rien vu.

translation.en: You know, your sister was supposed to be there that night. Could've been her picture in that file.
translation.fr: Ta sœur aurait dû être là.Ça aurait pu être elle.

translation.en: Do yourself a favor, son. Stay away from Olivia Shaw.
Table four says they've been waiting five minutes for coffee. I'm on it, I'm on it. [sighs]
translation.fr: - La table quatre attend son café.- Je m'en occupe.

translation.en: Can you do me a favor and refill number four?
OK, what can I get for--
I just need five minutes.
[Charlotte] I don't think so. I came to warn you.
I think the Crooked Man is back.
translation.fr: Je crois que le Tordu est de retour.

translation.en: I saw a picture of Steven's body.
translation.fr: J'ai vu une photo du corps de Steven.

translation.en: Whatever happened to him, it looked just like Jill.
translation.fr: Il ressemblait à celui de Jill.

translation.en: Violet says I'm not supposed to listen to you. Charlotte...
translation.fr: - Je ne suis pas censée t'écouter.- Charlotte.

translation.en: She says you're dangerous and unstable.
translation.fr: Elle dit que tu es dangereuse et instable.

translation.en: She's just trying to protect herself.
translation.fr: Elle essaie juste de se protéger.

translation.en: Charlotte, do you really think I killed Jill?
translation.fr: Charlotte, tu crois vraimentque j'ai tué Jill ?

translation.en: [woman on TV] Eastborough Police are investigating the tragic death of Grace Hutchinson.
translation.fr: La police d'Eastborough enquêtesur la mort de Grace Hutchinson.

translation.en: Our investigators say it initially looked like suicide.
translation.fr: Les enquêteurs pensentqu'il s'agit d'un suicide.

translation.en: They are not ready to make that claim just yet.
translation.fr: Ils ne sont pas encore prêts à l'affirmer.

translation.en: -Family and friends of Hutchinson... -[gasps]
translation.fr: La famille et les amis deHutchinson disent

translation.en: ...say there is no way this career woman and mother
translation.fr: La famille et les amis deHutchinson disent que cette mère n'auraitjamais pu se suicider.

translation.en: would take her own life.
translation.fr: que cette mère n'auraitjamais pu se suicider.

translation.en: Investigators say the tragic death of Hutchinson's teenage daughter...
translation.fr: Les enquêteurs parlent de la mortde la fille de Hutchinson...

translation.en: [Charlotte] Olive, you're right. Everyone who was there that night is dying.
translation.fr: Olive, tu as raison. Tous ceux qui étaientlà sont en train de mourir.

translation.en: Where did you get that?
I just found it. It's targeting us, isn't it?
translation.fr: - Je viens de le trouver.- Il nous vise.

translation.en: We need to let everyone know.
translation.fr: Il faut prévenir tout le monde.

translation.en: Toss your bike in the back. I'll drive.
translation.fr: Mets ton vélo à l'arrière. Je conduis.

translation.en: We need to talk.
-I'm working. -Violet, Jill's mother died last night.
translation.fr: - Je travaille.- La mère de Jill est morte hier soir.

translation.en: Let me guess. The boogeyman did it?
Kind of a coincidence, don't you think?
All of this happening just as I get back into town?
translation.fr: Tout ça alors que je reviens en ville ?

translation.en: You're not actually listening to this, are you?
Steven's body...
it looked like just like what happened to Jill. Look at it!
translation.fr: Ça ressemble à ce qui est arrivéà Jill. Regarde !

translation.en: What did happen to Jill, Olive?
You don't remember that night?
What I remember was a stupid, childish game,
translation.fr: Je me souviens d'un jeu stupide,

translation.en: and my best friend being found dead.
translation.fr: et de ma meilleure amie retrouvée morte.

translation.en: Look, you don't think I get it.
translation.fr: Tu crois que je comprends rien.

translation.en: If I'm the girl who killed Jill, then none of this was your fault.
translation.fr: Si j'ai tué Jill, tu n'y es pour rien.

translation.en: But if I'm right, and the Crooked Man is back--
translation.fr: Mais si j'ai raison,et que le Tordu est de retour.

translation.en: What, Olivia? What do you suggest we do?
Go into hiding because you think something you did six years ago has come back to kill us?
translation.fr: Qu'on se cache parce que tu croisque quelque chose va nous tuer ?

translation.en: Come on, you don't really believe this, do you?
Tell me, have you seen or experienced anything strange lately?
translation.fr: Dis-moi, as-tu vu ou ressentiquelque chose d'étrange récemment ?

translation.en: Does this conversation qualify? This is not a joke, Violet!
translation.fr: - Cette conversation par exemple ?- Ce n'est pas une blague !

translation.en: No, I haven't.
But if you're right, and if your little homecoming has somehow brought this thing back, then there's really only one answer, isn't there?
translation.fr: Mais si ton retour a fait revenir cettechose, il n'y a qu'une solution, non ?

translation.en: Leave. I have to get back to work.
Just--Just do me one favor, OK?
-Please stay out of the dark. -Olive, let's go.
translation.fr: - Ne reste pas dans le noir.- Allons-y.

translation.en: It lives in the dark. Just make sure you're always in the light, no matter what!
translation.fr: Ça vit dans le noir. Restedans la lumière, quoi qu'il arrive !

translation.en: [Charlotte] You're wasting your time.
-No one's seen her in years. -I'll be right back.
translation.fr: Personne ne l'a vue depuis des années. Je reviens.

translation.en: Who is it?
Alice isn't here.
Do you know when she'll be back?
She doesn't want to see you.
translation.fr: Elle ne veut pas vous voir.

translation.en: That's not what I asked.
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas ce que j'ai demandé.

translation.en: -I think you should go. -Please!
translation.fr: - Tu devrais partir.- S'il vous plaît.

translation.en: It's really important that I speak to your daughter. [woman] Go away!
That didn't work.
Wait. So the babysitter's the last one? Assuming we even know how to find her.
translation.fr: - La baby-sitter est la dernière ?- Si on sait comment la trouver.

translation.en: Actually, that's an easy one.
[Alice] Mother?
Trust me. It's for your protection.
-This is taking way too long. -I know. Come on.
Excuse us, excuse me, sorry. Sorry. Gotta get through.
Please, please, our friend is in danger.
translation.fr: - Notre amie est en danger.- Entrez.

translation.en: -[man] Go on in. -Thank you.
[man] You're good.
Ladies and gentlemen, please welcome to the stage Mia Johanssen.
[man] There she is!
Good evening, Eastborough. Thanks for coming out tonight.
translation.fr: Bonsoir, Eastborough.Merci d'être venus ce soir.

translation.en: It's good to be back in my hometown.
♪ I wait in the wings ♪
♪ The world keeps on spinning ♪
♪ Round and around we go ♪
She's really good.
♪ Still on my mind Haunted by memories ♪
♪ As in falling through time Just like raindrops ♪
translation.fr: Alors que je traverse le tempsComme les gouttes de pluie

translation.en: ♪ The sky sheds a tear ♪
♪ For those of us lost with our hearts ♪
♪ Time don't change a thing ♪
♪ This hurt in my heart ♪
translation.fr: Ça me fait mal au cœur

translation.en: ♪ Won't ever let go like a shadow ♪
translation.fr: Ça me fait mal au cœur Ne lâche pas comme une ombre

translation.en: What is it?
The darkness. It's here.
♪ Can never let go of this heart ♪
translation.fr: Ne lâche jamais Ce cœur brisé

translation.en: ♪ That's broken ♪
♪ Yes, love disappears ♪ ♪ And it's leaving me here ♪
translation.fr: Oui, l'amour disparaîtEt il me laisse ici

translation.en: Excuse me.
We have to get back there.
translation.fr: Il faut qu'on aille en coulisses.

translation.en: -You got a pass? -She's a friend of ours.
translation.fr: - Vous avez un passe ?- C'est une amie.

translation.en: Get lost.
Go away!
It's all in your head. It's all in your head.
Hello! Come on!
Anyone in there?
Excuse me.
You two can't take a hint.
translation.fr: - Vous ne comprenez rien.- Il y a un problème.

translation.en: -Something's wrong. -Mia?
translation.fr: - Vous ne comprenez rien.- Il y a un problème. - Mia ? Elle fait une pause.- On pense qu'elle a des ennuis.

translation.en: She's just taking a break. We think she might be in trouble.
translation.fr: - Mia ? Elle fait une pause.- On pense qu'elle a des ennuis.

translation.en: You're not getting in there. You do it then. Please!
translation.fr: - Vous n'entrerez pas.- Allez-y. S'il vous plaît.

translation.en: Fine. You two wait here.
Mia! Everything OK?
Mia?
Are you here? Jesus!
translation.fr: Mia ? Tu es là ? Bon sang !

translation.en: I can't comment on whether it was a suicide or not
translation.fr: Je ne peux pas dires'il s'agit d'un suicide,

translation.en: 'cause I haven't seen the autopsy.
translation.fr: car je n'ai pas vu l'autopsie.

translation.en: You know how long it took my dad to get off the case?
translation.fr: Il a fallu du temps pour que mon pèrelâche l'affaire.

translation.en: -What are you doing? -Look at this.
translation.fr: - Qu'est-ce que tu fais ?- Regarde ça.

translation.en: "Classmates of the two missing teens
mentioned that the two had recently displayed
translation.fr: ont dit qu'ils étaient fascinéspar un mème Internet

translation.en: a fascination for an Internet meme known as the Crooked Man."
translation.fr: ont dit qu'ils étaient fascinéspar un mème Internet appelé l'homme tordu."

translation.en: There's gotta be at least 50 stories here: Suicides, homicides, disappearances.
translation.fr: Il y a au moins 50 histoires.Suicides, homicides, disparitions.

translation.en: "Crooked Man Uncovered?"
The original site was taken down.
translation.fr: Le site original a été retiré.

translation.en: But according to this, a lot of people had recited that rhyme.
translation.fr: Mais beaucoup de gensavaient récité ces rimes.

translation.en: I thought maybe there might be some information
translation.fr: J'ai pensé qu'il pourrait y avoirdes informations

translation.en: on how to stop this thing.
Unfortunately, there's no contact information listed or anything.
translation.fr: Malheureusement, il n'y a aucun contact.

translation.en: -I have an idea. Come on. -Where are we going?
translation.fr: - J'ai une idée. Viens.- Où va-t-on ?

translation.en: -The Crooked Man? -You've heard of it?
translation.fr: Le Tordu ? - Tu connais ?- Un mème qui tue des gens ?

translation.en: Internet meme that kills people?
translation.fr: - Tu connais ?- Un mème qui tue des gens ?

translation.en: So can you find whoever put up that website or not?
translation.fr: Tu peux trouver qui a crééce site ou pas ?

translation.en: All you have to do is put the domain into a Whois search, and you should get what you need.
translation.fr: Il suffit de faire une recherchesur le domaine, et tu auras l'info.

translation.en: Got a P.O. box in Leveritt.
translation.fr: - Une boîte postale à Leveritt.- Pas de nom ?

translation.en: Looks like whoever did this wanted their privacy.
translation.fr: Celui qui a fait ça voulaitrester anonyme.

translation.en: But that should be pretty easy for you to trace, right?
translation.fr: Mais ça devrait être facileà trouver, non ?

translation.en: I thought you said this was going to be hard. We're cyber forensics. We can do anything.
translation.fr: Tu as dit que ce serait dur.On est des cyberdétectives. On fait tout.

translation.en: All I have to do is go into the system, find out who registered the box, and...
translation.fr: Il suffit de chercher quia enregistré la boîte et...

translation.en: It's been abandoned for three years.
translation.fr: Elle est abandonnée depuis trois ans.

translation.en: -Great. -So back to square one?
translation.fr: - Super.- Retour à la case départ ?

translation.en: Wait.
What--What are you doing?
Most computers automatically imprint their files
translation.fr: La plupart des ordinateursgravent leurs fichiers

translation.en: with a level of metadata, such as who created them and where.
translation.fr: La plupart des ordinateursgravent leurs fichiers avec des métadonnées, une sorted'empreinte digitale.

translation.en: Kinda like a fingerprint.
translation.fr: avec des métadonnées, une sorted'empreinte digitale.

translation.en: So, for example, if the site has any photos,
translation.fr: Par exemple, s'il y a des photos sur le site, je peuxtrouver quel ordinateur les a postées.

translation.en: I can find out where the computer was that posted them.
translation.fr: s'il y a des photos sur le site, je peuxtrouver quel ordinateur les a postées.

translation.en: Thanks.
-You can't leave now! -[Violet] Look, Olive...
translation.fr: - Tu ne peux pas partir !- Écoute.

translation.en: I'm sorry I told everyone you were crazy,
translation.fr: Pardon d'avoir dit que tu étais folle,

translation.en: and I'm sorry I didn't support you all those years ago, but I am not going to sit around and wait to die!
translation.fr: et de ne pas t'avoir soutenue, mais jene veux pas mourir !

translation.en: This guy maybe will have some answers for us.
translation.fr: Ce type aura peut-être des réponses.

translation.en: Is that gonna help Jill or Jill's mom or Mia?
translation.fr: Ça va aider Jill, sa mère ou Mia ?

translation.en: All gassed up!
Violet's not coming.
What do you mean, she's not coming? We had a plan.
translation.fr: Comment ça ? On avait un plan.

translation.en: What if you're wrong? What if you can't stop it?
translation.fr: Et si tu avais tort ?Et si tu ne peux pas l'arrêter ?

translation.en: You think running will help? I do know staying here won't.
translation.fr: - Tu crois que fuir t'aidera ?- Rester est dangereux.

translation.en: Come with me. You don't need to be a part of this.
translation.fr: Viens avec moi. Ne te mêle pas de ça.

translation.en: Yes, I do. We've been hiding too long.
translation.fr: On se cache depuis trop longtemps.

translation.en: -It's your funeral. -Violet...
translation.fr: - À tes risques et périls.- Violet !

translation.en: Be careful. Please?
You too.
What are you doing?
Alice! -[Olivia screams] -[Alice] Grab my hand!
-Olivia, what are you doing here? -I need to talk to you.
translation.fr: - Que fais-tu ici ?- Je dois te parler.

translation.en: You need to leave. It's not safe.
Alice... what happened?
Please go.
Not until I talk to you first. It's important.
translation.fr: Pas avant de t'avoir parlé.C'est important.

translation.en: These drawings...
You can't just come in here and go through my stuff.
-Alice! -It's private!
Alice, you're not alone.
I've seen them too.
We're being warned.
Look, there's a site I found. Dozens of cases just like ours.
translation.fr: J'ai trouvé un site.Des dizaines de cas comme le nôtre.

translation.en: -The Crooked Man? -Yes.
Noah had a friend at the police station track down whoever put the site up.
translation.fr: Noah a un ami policier qui chercheceux qui ont créé ce site.

translation.en: If they've been doing all the research, then-then maybe they know how to stop it.
translation.fr: S'ils ont fait toutes ces recherches,ils savent peut-être comment l'arrêter.

translation.en: It's too late. This is why I need you to come with me.
translation.fr: - C'est trop tard.- Tu dois venir avec moi.

translation.en: -I can't. -Alice...
Mother says never leave the house without her.
translation.fr: Mère m'a dit de nejamais sortir sans elle.

translation.en: People are dying! She says I'm safe here.
translation.fr: - Il y a des morts !- Elle dit que je suis en sécurité ici.

translation.en: Do you believe her?
this could be our chance to finally fix what we did.
translation.fr: C'est notre chancede réparer ce qu'on a fait.

translation.en: We can make things right.
I get carsick.
translation.fr: J'ai le mal de la route.

translation.en: We'll crack a window. Come on.
Olivia? You saw something, didn't you?
translation.fr: Olivia ? Tu as vu quelque chose,n'est-ce pas ?

translation.en: It's over here.
Is anyone there?
Anybody?
-[man] What are you doing here? -[all gasp]
-Olivia. -How do you know my name?
You're very lucky.
Not many people have come face to face with the Crooked Man and survived.
translation.fr: Peu de gens ont survécuà un face-à-face avec le Tordu.

translation.en: You know about that?
Of course.
That's why you're here, isn't it? To find someone who can give you all the answers.
translation.fr: Vous êtes là pour ça ?Pour trouver des réponses.

translation.en: Let's start with what this thing is and where it came from.
translation.fr: Commençons par ce que c'estet d'où ça vient.

translation.en: In the 1800s, a writer researching legends and folklore
translation.fr: Au 19e siècle, un écrivain qui faisaitdes recherches sur les mythes et légendes

translation.en: discovered dozens of different cultures in dozens of different languages,
translation.fr: a découvert que de nombreuses cultureset langues différentes

translation.en: all referring to the same thing.
translation.fr: faisaient référence à la même chose.

translation.en: He called it the Crooked Man.
Imagine a death sentence that no mortal could escape,
translation.fr: Une peine de mort à laquelle aucun mortelne pourrait échapper,

translation.en: that no human law could pardon,
the eternal, unstoppable force
translation.fr: Une force éternelle, irrésistible,qui inflige une mort certaine

translation.en: bringing certain death to anyone who dare summon it.
translation.fr: Une force éternelle, irrésistible,qui inflige une mort certaine à quiconque ose la convoquer.

translation.en: It probably started as an tribal incantation.
translation.fr: Ça a dû commencerpar une incantation tribale.

translation.en: A curse.
The words were translated and passed down through the ages, evolving with the times.
translation.fr: Les mots ont été traduits et transmisà travers les âges.

translation.en: Over the years, it was transcribed and studied.
translation.fr: Au fil des années,ils ont été transcrits et étudiés.

translation.en: Part of it was even turned into a nursery rhyme.
Eventually someone put it online.
translation.fr: Quelqu'un a fini par la mettre en ligne.

translation.en: And with that, the proverbial Pandora's Box was out there.
translation.fr: Et la boîte de Pandore a été ouverte.

translation.en: The Crooked Man now belonged to the world.
translation.fr: L'homme tordu appartenaitdésormais au monde entier.

translation.en: You were the one that put it up on Creepyhollow.
translation.fr: C'est vous qui l'avez missur Creepyhollow.

translation.en: Funny thing about the Internet.
You can take down content, but it never really goes away.
translation.fr: c'est qu'on peut retirerdu contenu, mais il ne disparaît jamais.

translation.en: By the time I realized what was happening, that... that the Crooked Man was real,
translation.fr: Quand j'ai compris ce qui se passait,que le Tordu était réel,

translation.en: it was too late.
I tried to get back online to warn people.
translation.fr: J'ai essayé de prévenir les gens.

translation.en: Four people in our town are dead!
translation.fr: Quatre personnesde notre ville sont mortes !

translation.en: And not a minute goes by where I'm not tormented by what I did.
translation.fr: Je suis sans cesse tourmentépar ce que j'ai fait.

translation.en: I'm up in that sanctuary every day,
translation.fr: Je suis dans ce sanctuaire tous les jours,

translation.en: praying for the souls of the people I killed.
translation.fr: à prier pour ceux que j'ai tués.

translation.en: Now, ever since I came back...
The Crooked Man returned.
Why?
When you left, somehow you...
translation.fr: Quand tu es partie, on dirait que

translation.en: you paused the curse.
But now that you're back,
now that all who were marked have returned and reunited,
translation.fr: que toutes les personnes marquéesse sont réunies, c'est comme si

translation.en: it's like you never left.
I tried to warn you.
I tried to get you to leave before he returned.
translation.fr: De te faire partir avant son retour.

translation.en: What are you talking about?
-The rock. -That was you.
But now it's too late.
What if she left again?
Too many people have died now.
He's coming for you.
There's no order, no rhyme, no reason.
translation.fr: Il n'y a pas d'ordre, pas de logique.

translation.en: Where there's darkness, he will be there.
translation.fr: Il sera là où là où il y a des ténèbres.

translation.en: But there has to be a way to stop him, right?
translation.fr: Il doit y avoir un moyen de l'arrêter.

translation.en: You can't.
He cannot be stopped.
You cannot hide,
translation.fr: Tu ne peux ni te cacher

translation.en: and you cannot run.
If you have been cursed by the Crooked Man,
translation.fr: Si tu as été maudit par le Tordu,

translation.en: he will kill you eventually,
no matter what.
Keep it down!
[whispering] Our Father, who art in heaven, hallowed be thy name,
translation.fr: Notre Père qui es aux cieux,que Ton Nom soit sanctifié,

translation.en: thy kingdom come, thy will be done--
translation.fr: que Ton règne vienne,que Ta volonté soit faite.

translation.en: I-I thought you were sleeping.
-There's something I have to do. -Wait. Hey, where--
translation.fr: - J'ai quelque chose à faire.- Attends. Où ?

translation.en: Wait a minute.
[exhales] No way.
Classical fairy tales?
-Ancient mythology? -Noah.
Your dad said you'd be here.
translation.fr: - Ton père a dit que tu serais là.- Qu'y a-t-il ?

translation.en: -What's wrong? -Can we go talk?
translation.fr: - Ton père a dit que tu serais là.- Qu'y a-t-il ? On peut parler ?

translation.en: Yeah, of course.
Noah, what is it?
Noah, how do you have this?
I have to tell you something...
translation.fr: J'ai quelque chose à te dire.

translation.en: about when we were kids. What?
The night of the sleepover?
translation.fr: La nuit de la soirée pyjama ?

translation.en: The night Jill died?
translation.fr: La nuit où Jill est morte ?

translation.en: I was there.
My sister was supposed to be there.
I was on my way home from basketball practice,
translation.fr: Je rentrais de l'entraînement de basket

translation.en: and I thought-- I thought I'd swing by and give 'em a little scare, you know.
translation.fr: et je me suis ditque je passerais leur faire peur.

translation.en: But by the time I got there, I realized she wasn't there. It was too late.
translation.fr: Mais le temps d'arriver,elle n'était pas là. C'était trop tard.

translation.en: And then when the lights went off, I got so scared that I would be seen, so I left.
translation.fr: Quand les lumières se sont éteintes,j'ai eu peur et je suis parti.

translation.en: I'm screwed, aren't I?
Noah, I am so sorry. I had no idea. But it's gonna be OK now, right?
translation.fr: - Noah, je suis désolée. Je ne savais pas.- Mais ça va aller. Pas vrai ?

translation.en: Because you figured out where the website came from,
translation.fr: Tu as découvert d'où venait le site,

translation.en: so you're gonna make it stop. Not quite.
translation.fr: - tu vas le faire arrêter.- Pas tout à fait.

translation.en: That's encouraging. But I'm working on it.
So I am screwed.
We're gonna fix this, OK?
I promise.
Noah, what is it?
You really don't see that.
It's him, isn't it?
What is he doing?
He's trying to get us...
but he can't.
It's the light.
As long as we stay out of the dark, we should be OK.
translation.fr: Tant qu'on n'est pas dans le noir,ça devrait aller.

translation.en: He's gone.
Come on. I have an idea.
"Only with this crooked song shall the Crooked Man yield."
translation.fr: "Seule cette chanson tordue,fera céder le Tordu."

translation.en: At first, I thought it was talking about the rhyme itself.
translation.fr: Au début,j'ai cru que ça parlait de la rime.

translation.en: But what if it literally means "song"?
What if this music box is the key to the whole thing?
translation.fr: Et si cette boîte à musiqueétait la clé de tout ça ?

translation.en: Milo said there was a writer in the 1800s
translation.fr: Milo a dit qu'un écrivain,dans les années 1800,

translation.en: who was doing research on old legends
translation.fr: avait fait des recherches sur les légendes

translation.en: and found out about the Crooked Man.
He found the music box,
and he accidentally summoned the Crooked Man.
translation.fr: à musique et invoquéle Tordu par accident.

translation.en: If this box is out there,
translation.fr: Si cette boîte est quelque part,

translation.en: we might be able to stop this thing.
All we have to do is find it.
What is it? We have to turn around. Now.
translation.fr: - Qu'y a-t-il ?- Il faut faire demi-tour.

translation.en: [Noah] Anything? Voicemail.
-Hope we're not too late. -Come on!
translation.fr: J'espère qu'il n'est pas trop tard.

translation.en: [Crooked Man] See you soon, Olivia.
[man] She didn't do anything.
Oh, I forgot.
It's the boogeyman, right?
Son, a word.
Olivia and I have been together the whole time.
translation.fr: Olivia et moi étionsensemble tout ce temps.

translation.en: [Police Officer] Five people are dead, Noah. She left three suicide notes.
translation.fr: - Cinq personnes sont mortes.- Elle a laissé trois lettres de suicide.

translation.en: You saw the body. You think she did that to herself?
translation.fr: Tu as vu le corps.Elle se serait fait ça elle-même ?

translation.en: Not exactly.
Please tell me you're not drinking the fruit punch.
translation.fr: Ne me dis pas que tu la crois.

translation.en: -I know it sounds crazy. -You are a police officer.
translation.fr: - Je sais que ça a l'air dingue.- Tu es policier.

translation.en: -[Noah] I know what I saw! -OK. Here's what's gonna happen.
translation.fr: - Je sais ce que j'ai vu !- Voilà ce qui va se passer.

translation.en: -You're not listening. -You're gonna take her down
translation.fr: - Tu n'écoutes pas.- Emmène-la au poste.

translation.en: -to the police station, OK? -You're gonna arrest her?
translation.fr: - Tu n'écoutes pas.- Emmène-la au poste. - Tu vas l'arrêter ?- Je lui parlerai

translation.en: I'm gonna come down there and talk to her as soon as I'm done here.
translation.fr: - Tu vas l'arrêter ?- Je lui parlerai dès que j'aurai fini ici.

translation.en: Do you want me to have somebody else do this?
translation.fr: Tu veux que quelqu'un d'autre le fasse ?

translation.en: How could she have felt so helpless?
translation.fr: Comment a-t-elle pu se sentirsi impuissante ?

translation.en: I'm sorry.
What are you doing?
I have no choice.
-[Olivia] Noah! -[Noah] Don't make a scene.
translation.fr: - Noah !- Ne fais pas une scène.

translation.en: -You can't do this! -Just get in the car, please.
translation.fr: - Tu ne peux pas faire ça !- Monte dans la voiture, s'il te plaît.

translation.en: This is 4-30. Suspect in custody. 10-7 to station.
[man on radio] Copy that, Noah.
What are you doing? Noah!
Shh! We're alone now.
We got about 20 minutes until my father realizes where we're going.
translation.fr: On a 20 minutesavant que mon père comprenne où on va.

translation.en: I'm sorry.
So where do we go now?
Looks like a place a professor would live.
translation.fr: On dirait un endroit où vivraitun professeur.

translation.en: [woman] Well, it's always nice to meet some of dad's former students.
translation.fr: J'aime rencontrerles anciens élèves de papa.

translation.en: He always spoke so highly of you and your mom.
translation.fr: Il disait tant de biende vous et de votre mère.

translation.en: I thought, since we happened to be in the area,
translation.fr: Comme on était dans le coin,

translation.en: that we should pay our respects.
Oh, you found Milo, I see.
He was my dad's teaching assistant for years.
Which--which class of his did you take again?
World Culture and Mythology.
Yeah. That was one of his favorites.
translation.fr: Oui. C'était un de ses préférés.

translation.en: -Sugar? -No, thank you.
He always would tell the most interesting stories.
He would make you feel like you were right in the middle of it all.
translation.fr: On avait l'impressiond'être en plein dedans.

translation.en: It must've been amazing, growing up with a father like that,
translation.fr: Ça a dû être incroyablede grandir avec un père pareil,

translation.en: all the stories he must have had.
To tell you the truth, yeah, he saved most of that for his students.
translation.fr: À vrai dire, il gardait ses histoires pour ses élèves.

translation.en: I can only imagine all the things he must have left behind.
translation.fr: J'imagine toutce qu'il a dû laisser derrière lui.

translation.en: I heard he had quite the collection.
translation.fr: Il paraît qu'il avaitune belle collection.

translation.en: You want to see it?
[Olivia] Look at all this stuff.
Some of these items must be pretty valuable.
translation.fr: Certains de ces objetsdoivent avoir de la valeur.

translation.en: [woman] Yeah, well, you can't put a price on your father's memory.
translation.fr: La mémoire d'un père n'a pas de prix.

translation.en: [Olivia] I imagine not.
That was one of his more recent finds.
translation.fr: C'était une de ses découvertesles plus récentes.

translation.en: I remember him talking about it.
translation.fr: Je me souviens qu'il en parlait.

translation.en: May I?
Who are you?
-We told you. -No.
First of all,
what, were you 12 years old when he still taught that class?
translation.fr: tu avais 12 ansquand il enseignait encore ce cours ?

translation.en: And second of all, he never would've spoken very highly of me.
translation.fr: Ensuite,il n'aurait jamais dit du bien de moi.

translation.en: Certainly not my mother,
so do you wanna tell me what you're really doing here?
translation.fr: alors dis-moi ce que tu fais vraiment ici.

translation.en: Have you heard the rhyme about the Crooked Man?
translation.fr: Vous connaissez la comptine sur le Tordu ?

translation.en: [scoffs] Of course. My father wrote a book about the author.
translation.fr: Bien sûr. Mon père a écritun livre sur cet auteur.

translation.en: We believe it's real.
After your father died,
translation.fr: Après la mort de votre père,

translation.en: Milo posted the means to summon him online.
translation.fr: Milo a publiéun moyen de le convoquer en ligne.

translation.en: Six people have died,
and unless we can figure out how to undo our mistake,
translation.fr: et à moins de réparer notre erreur,

translation.en: there will be more.
We believe this box might be the only way to stop it.
translation.fr: Nous pensons que cette boîteest le seul moyen de l'arrêter.

translation.en: I'm gonna show you something.
translation.fr: Je vais vous montrer quelque chose.

translation.en: Something that I have not shown anyone.
translation.fr: Quelque choseque je n'ai montré à personne.

translation.en: Not the police.
But when I--when I found my father's body in the classroom...
translation.fr: Quand j'ai trouvé le corps de monpère dans sa salle de classe...

translation.en: he had this.
We can end it.
For good.
We just need to borrow the box.
translation.fr: On doit juste emprunter la boîte.

translation.en: Please.
You get that son of a bitch.
[woman on TV] Noah Harris' black SUV
was reportedly seen early this morning heading north.
translation.fr: depuis que le 4x4noir a été aperçu allant vers le nord.

translation.en: Harris and Olivia Shaw are being sought by police
translation.fr: Harris et Olivia Shawsont recherchés par la police

translation.en: in connection with last night's brutal slaying that--
translation.fr: pour le meurtre brutal d'hier soir.

translation.en: I always knew she was trouble.
I always said it.
Not at the dinner table.
Dear Lord, bless this food that we are about to eat
and all that it provides.
translation.fr: et tout ce qu'elle nous donne.

translation.en: -Amen. -[Alice] Amen.
Looks like a storm is coming in.
[clears throat] Now... where were we?
-I am going to check the breakers. -No! I mean... I'll come with you.
translation.fr: - Je vais vérifier les disjoncteurs.- Non ! Je viens avec toi.

translation.en: I should get some candles.
You know, maybe it's-it's the whole block.
Maybe.
There's nothing there. There's nothing there.
Mother?
-Alice? -Mother, I can't open the door!
translation.fr: Maman, je n'arrive pas à ouvrir la porte !

translation.en: Mother, are you OK?
I'm scared!
Mother? Is that you?
How 'bout a light?
I should've been there.
No, you can't blame yourself.
translation.fr: Tu ne peux pas t'en vouloir.

translation.en: [Olivia] For six years, her mother tried everything she could,
translation.fr: Pendant six ans, sa mère a fait tout ce qu'elle a pu,

translation.en: and probably more than she should, to keep Alice safe.
translation.fr: plus qu'elle n'aurait dû,pour protéger Alice.

translation.en: Hey, she's alive.
How many people have died because of me?
translation.fr: Combien de gens sont mortsà cause de moi ?

translation.en: You're the one that's trying to save them.
translation.fr: C'est toi qui essaies de les sauver.

translation.en: He called my name.
What are you talking about?
Back at the house,
when I touched the music box, he called my name.
translation.fr: quand j'ai touché la boîte à musique, il m'a appelée.

translation.en: And it wasn't the first time.
translation.fr: Ce n'était pas la première fois.

translation.en: This is all my fault. All of this.
translation.fr: Tout est de ma faute. Tout ça.

translation.en: -He's taunting me. -No, no, no, you can't think like that.
translation.fr: - Il me nargue.- Ne dis pas ça.

translation.en: No, I killed them, Noah. I killed all of them!
translation.fr: Non, je les ai tués,Noah. Je les ai tous tués !

translation.en: You think she can hear me? She's in a coma because of me.
translation.fr: Tu crois qu'elle m'entend ?Elle est dans le coma à cause de moi.

translation.en: Don't you understand? Because of me!
translation.fr: Tu comprends ? À cause de moi !

translation.en: [Noah] Come on, let's go.
-Don't you ever turn the light off! Ever! -She's just a little tired. Excuse us.
translation.fr: N'éteins jamais la lumière ! Jamais ! Elle est un peu fatiguée. Excusez-nous.

translation.en: I'm the one who started it. I'm the one who needs to end it.
translation.fr: C'est moi qui ai commencé.C'est à moi d'y mettre fin.

translation.en: How?
[exhales] The music box, it showed me something.
translation.fr: La boîte à musique m'amontré quelque chose.

translation.en: A crooked house. I think that's where we have to find him.
translation.fr: Une maison tordue.C'est là qu'il faut le trouver.

translation.en: Did it show you where it was?
translation.fr: Elle t'a montré où elle était ?

translation.en: Uh... All I saw were woods.
translation.fr: Je n'ai vu que des bois.

translation.en: Think.
Were there any specific characteristics or landmarks? Anything specific?
translation.fr: Y avait-il des caractéristiquesou repères particuliers ? Un truc spécifique ?

translation.en: Just a clearing.
But--But I did notice two large rocks and giant pine tree.
translation.fr: Mais j'ai remarqué deuxgros rochers et un pin géant.

translation.en: As if that even helps.
Actually, it does.
-Come here. Come here. -What are you doing?
translation.fr: - Viens là.- Qu'est-ce que tu fais ?

translation.en: Let's go, let's go.
[Noah] I was a cub scout when I was a kid.
One day my troop went for a hike through this park.
translation.fr: Un jour, ma troupe a faitune randonnée dans ce parc.

translation.en: We found this clearing and two rocks.
translation.fr: On a trouvé une clairière et deux rochers.

translation.en: Just like your vision.
You ready?
-[Olivia] For Alice. -[Noah] For Alice.
We're close.
We're here.
This is exactly what I remember.
translation.fr: C'est ce dont je me souviens.

translation.en: The rocks, the trees.
[exhales] And the house was somewhere... right...
translation.fr: Et la maison était quelque part par là.

translation.en: -Did you see-- -[Noah] No. That house was not there a minute ago.
translation.fr: Cette maison n'étaitpas là il y a une minute.

translation.en: So what happens now?
We kill the Crooked Man.
I'll go check the upstairs. Be careful.
translation.fr: - Je vais voir en haut.- Fais attention.

translation.en: Oh, God. You all right?
All right? You OK? Yeah.
-[Noah] What are you doing? -Making a call.
translation.fr: - Qu'est-ce que tu fais ?- Un appel.

translation.en: ♪ There was a Crooked Man ♪
translation.fr: Il était une fois un Tordu

translation.en: ♪ Who walked a crooked mile ♪
translation.fr: Qui marchait sur un chemin tordu

translation.en: ♪ He found a crooked sixpence ♪
translation.fr: Il a trouvé une pièce de travers

translation.en: ♪ Upon a crooked stile ♪
♪ He bought a crooked cat ♪
♪ Which caught a crooked mouse ♪
♪ And they all lived together ♪ ♪ In a little crooked house ♪
translation.fr: Et ils vécurent tous ensembleDans une petite maison tordue

translation.en: Something's happening.
♪ Then came the Crooked Man ♪
♪ When you say his crooked rhyme ♪
translation.fr: Quand tu dis ses rimes tordues

translation.en: ♪ Down your crooked paths, he follows ♪
translation.fr: Sur tes chemins tordus il suit

translation.en: ♪ With his crooked spine ♪
♪ When he sets his crooked gaze ♪
translation.fr: Quand il pose son regard tordu

translation.en: ♪ Upon your potter's field ♪
♪ Then only with his crooked song ♪
translation.fr: Ce n'est qu'avec son chant tordu

translation.en: ♪ Shall the Crooked Man yield ♪
He's here.
What do you want? Haven't you taken enough already?
translation.fr: Qu'est-ce que tu veux ?Tu n'en as pas assez pris ?

translation.en: You should really see somebody about that posture problem of yours.
translation.fr: Tu devrais voir quelqu'unpour ton problème de posture.

translation.en: Is it working? Anything happening?
translation.fr: Ça marche ? Il se passe quelque chose ?

translation.en: Yeah.
I saw that going differently.
What am I missing?
Hey! It's me again.
-Are you OK? -It's not working.
translation.fr: - Ça va ?- Ça ne marche pas.

translation.en: "Only with this crooked song." I don't know what I'm doing wrong.
translation.fr: Quand il a entendu cette chanson...Je ne sais pas ce qu'il manque.

translation.en: We know that when you recite the poem,
translation.fr: Quand tu récites le poème, il est appelé.

translation.en: -it summons him, right? -Yes.
translation.fr: Quand tu récites le poème, il est appelé. - Oui.- La boîte pourrait faire pareil.

translation.en: And so the box must serve the same purpose.
translation.fr: - Oui.- La boîte pourrait faire pareil.

translation.en: -Right. -In order to reverse its effects and take him back, we've got...
translation.fr: Pour l'inverser et l'éliminer, on doit...

translation.en: To play it backwards! OK, OK!
-[Noah] Hurry up. -I'm going as fast as I can!
translation.fr: Je fais aussi vite que je peux.

translation.en: Whatever happens, keep playing.
translation.fr: Quoi qu'il arrive, continue à jouer.

translation.en: Keep... playing.
Go back to hell, you son of a bitch!
translation.fr: Retourne en enfer, fils de pute !

translation.en: You're alive!
Come on. We need to get out of here.
Come on, Noah!
It's over.
It's over now.
Finally.
[girl] That's so old school.
How about the one with the killer in the hockey mask?
translation.fr: Et l'histoire du tueurau masque de hockey ?

translation.en: Or the killer doll?
[girl 1] I know. Have you any of you heard about the song that kills you if you sing it?
translation.fr: Je sais. Vous connaissez la chanson quivous tue si vous la chantez ?
